snippet: A deal for Jared L. Loughner, whose shooting rampage left six people dead and Gabrielle Giffords wounded, means that victims’ relatives will not have to endure a trial.
abstract: Jared L Loughner pleads guilty to killing six people and wounding 13 others, including Arizona Rep Gabrielle Giffords, in 2011 shooting rampage in Tuscon; he faces life in prison with no chance of parole; deal means that victims' relatives will not have to endure a trial.
lead_paragraph: A deal for Jared L. Loughner, whose shooting rampage left six people dead and Gabrielle Giffords wounded, means that victims’ relatives will not have to endure a trial.

headline.seo: Guilty Plea Ends Rampage Case at Giffords Event in Tuscon
headline.main: Life Term for Gunman After Guilty Plea in Tucson Killings
headline.print_headline: Tucson Case Comes to End With Plea By Gunman
